Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2013 10:46AM redheadinwv wrote: Hello all! I am a new joiner, although a lurker for a while now. I am 39, first diagnosed in April of 2012 then in December 2012 diagnosed Stage IV with met to spine.  I have a 17 year old son and am happily married to my very best friend. I was first diagnosed as triple negative, had a reoccurence on chemo (AC & T) which came back HER2+ therefore the change in status.  I start Herceptin/Perjeta/Taxotere tomorrow.  I have been on Zometa for 2 months now. Carla
Posts.Title: Roll Call 2013 LilSchatzie reader123

Posts.Content: redheadinwv wrote: HI everyone, I am just now getting to the point that I'm comfortable with posting but wanted to reach out and say hello as I've been lurking for quite a while.  I am 39 was diagnosed as Stage IV the 13th of December 2012 with a single met to the T4 vertebrae. New mets to liver and T-5 vertebrae 2/27/13 Dx 4/25/2012, IDC, 3cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, 4/28 nodes, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Targeted Therapy 1/22/2013 Perjeta (pertuzumab) Targeted Therapy 1/22/2013 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2013 02:36PM redheadinwv wrote: Cickadee, I am one of the "new faces", I haven't posted much at this time but value ALL the knowledge I have gathered from your many posts, I've searched for answers using the search function and always found solace in the posts. I was only diagnosed IV in December of 2012 and am still coming to grips with everything but I hope that while you are grieving for your friends that you do still continue to post and remain active for those of us who are newer. Carla
